text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: I'm coming in. Yoohoo, Trainer,<n>how's it going?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
I see, I see. That's great to hear.<n>Staying positive is what
matters, no<n>matter who you are.

Seiun Sky continues to look around<n>the room restlessly,
seemingly unable<n>to relax.
At the very least, it's clear that<n>something is bothering her.
choice_data_list: Why don't we go out for some fresh air?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Oh? Now this is a sight to see. Is my<n>trainer suggesting we
go play hooky?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Sounds like a plan, but what should<n>we do? Sunbathing?
Looking for cats?<n>Or maybe, just maybe... fishing?
choice_data_list: You got it, let's go fishing!

text_block_list.text: The two of us head out on a fishing<n>trip. However...

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Haha! You aren't very good at this,<n>are you? Well, I guess
I'm not one to<n>talk either. Nya-ha-ha!
choice_data_list:
You're in high spirits, considering our distinct
lack of any haul.

You're in high spirits, considering our distinct
lack of any haul.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Heh-heh-heh. Do I look that way? Do<n>I, now?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Let me give you some words of<n>wisdom—"Love fish, but
love fishing<n>even more."

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: It's not about what or how much youfish up. What's important is howyou fish.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
You can't just swing your rod<n>haphazardly, nor can you
rely on<n>strength alone to reel. You have to<n>keep
thinking—keep trying new<n>approaches.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Set your goal, collect intel, make<n>preparations, and then try it
out in<n>practice. By repeating this process,<n>you learn what
works and what<n>doesn't.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
And when the bait you've been<n>prepping finally catches
them hook,<n>line, and sinker—it doesn't get better<n>than that.
choice_data_list: It sounds a bit like how you run.
It sounds a bit like how you run.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: ...Hm. Which part?
choice_data_list:
You know, how you prepare various strategies
to help you win.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Come on, what're you saying? I thinkyou of all people would know this bynow, but I'm not that great of a racer, y'know?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
It's not like I'm the kid of some<n>famous G1 racer or
anything... and I<n>got a pretty dubious rep around the<n>
academy, too. There isn't a drop of<n>ambition inside me.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
I don't have any lofty dreams. I just<n>want to spend my
days peacefully,<n>whiling the time away fishing! That's<n>the
kind of life I live.
choice_data_list: But don't you want to take home the gold?
But don't you want to take home the gold?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: ...The gold?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Hmm? Wait a second... Are you really<n>my trainer?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
The trainer I know is a pushover<n>rookie who lets me off the
hook, no<n>matter what I say. Right?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Don't tell me... Are you actually a<n>doppelganger that arose
from the<n>swamp to take their place? Yikes.
choice_data_list: I'm your trainer—the one and only.
I'm your trainer—the one and only.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Right, of course... Then how come—
choice_data_list: I'm your trainer, so I want to support you.
I'm your trainer, so I want to support you.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
...Hey. Anyone ever tell you that you<n>sometimes say the
darndest things?

For a while, Seiun Sky and I simply sit<n>together in silence
with both our<n>fishing lines cast into the water.
Some time passes...

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
You know... I get it, I really do. This is<n>the part where I open
up to you, isn't<n>it?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
The part where I drop a sob story<n>about how I'm not
talented enough to<n>reach my dreams, or that I just<n>wasn't
born with the right build to go<n>pro.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
But I still think it's... well, wouldn't it<n>be boring for me to
just put down my<n>rod and give up?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
That's why I studied, pondered,<n>pondered some more, and
prepared all<n>sorts of bait and techniques.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Then one day, I finally reeled in a bigone. No one ever expected me to catchsomething that impressive!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Man, that was fun! I was on cloud<n>nine! You should've
seen everyone's<n>faces, with their mouths hanging open<n>
in awe!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: They were all like, "She caughtthat?! But how?! There's just noway!"
choice_data_list: So that's the source of your strength.
So that's the source of your strength.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: ...I wonder why.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
To be honest, I'm not really one for<n>the overzealous
sportsmanship.<n>Y'know, passion, guts, hard work!<n>...All
that exhausting hype.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
But still, for some reason... I can't<n>stop thinking about how I
felt in that<n>moment.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Just to be clear, I'm talking about<n>fishing—but you knew
that.
choice_data_list: Let's reel in some big ones together, okay?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Trainer...

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
...Whoa there, me. Gotta go back to<n>my happy-go-lucky
mode.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Hey, why don't we go hit the training<n>track? I suddenly
have the urge to<n>move my legs a bit.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
B-but don't get the wrong idea! I'm<n>not saying I'll listen to
your coaching<n>from now on, or anything like that!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
...Just kidding. I tried to play coy there.<n>How was that? Was
I cute? Tee-hee!<n>☆

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Wha?! Wait a sec...

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
For starters... you're gonna have to<n>learn not to take my
jokes at face<n>value.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Please, I'm begging you. We gotta<n>work on our
coordination, don't we?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: After all, we're gonna need it to reel<n>in a big one!

Later, Seiun Sky and I finally complete<n>our first training
session together.
